release.description: This is a maintenance release. It includes only one bug fix.
release.action: Fixed non-bracketing issue when RESET_STATE slightly moves an event at the start of a step and another regular event happens in the first half of the same step

release.description: This is a major release. The mains changes are improved relatived scheduling of step handlers and events handlers in ODE, addition of a finish callback in step handlers and bug fixes.
release.action: Allow retrieving event handler configuration from ODE integrators.
Added a separate finish method in ODE step handlers to be called after last step.
Fixed out-of-order scheduling of calls to step handlers and event handlers.
Removed methods and constants deprecated during the 1.x series.
Added event filtering for field ODE.
Use primitive double for initial step and error factors in Field adaptive step size integrators.
Fix interpolation of a pair of ODE states whose times are the same. Such a pair can appear when a RESET_STATE or RESET_DERIVATIVES event occurs at the integration stop time.
No changes directly in this module. However, lower level Hipparchus modules did change, hence a new release was needed.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. It fixes an infinite loop in event handling.
release.action: Fix infinite loop in event handling when a RESET_STATE or RESET_DERIVATIVES event causes two other event detectors to trigger simultaneously and discontinuously at the same time.
No changes directly in this module. However, lower level Hipparchus modules did change, hence a new release was needed.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction reset events in ODE.
release.action: Fixed missing safety check in multi-step integrators. Github: fixes #62.
Avoid too many multi-step integrator restarts after event resetting derivatives. Github: fixes #54.

Add Action.RESET_EVENTS to ask the integrator to recheck all event detectors without recomputing the step. Use when the g function of one event detector depends on events occurring in another event detector.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction of support for complex ordinary differential equations (both primary and secondary equations).
release.action: Added support for complex ordinary differential equations (both primary and secondary equations). Github: fixes #39.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version is that secondary equations can now updates the derivatives of the primary equation.
release.action: Fix Field ODE interpolation with restricted step.
Allow secondary equations to update derivatives of primary equation in ODE. GitHub: fixes #31.
No changes directly in this module. However, lower level Hipparchus modules did change, hence a new release was needed.
Fixed Field ODE integrators handling of secondary equations. GitHub: fixes #7.

release.description: This is the first release of the library
release.action: Fix out of order event detection in rare cases.
Revamped Ordinary Differential Equations API to match the new API introduced with field-based ODE.
Fixed wrong handling of state resets in Adams-Bashforth and Adams-Moulton integrators.
Fixed infinite loop when some step reduction was silently filtered to min step in Gragg-Bulirsch-Stoer integrator.
Added early detection of NaNs appearing during integration.
Enhance reliability of event detection with multiple event detectors.
Revamped Ordinary Differential Equations API to match the new API introduced with field-based ODE.
Modularized the library.
